name: The Long Walk (Ryder James, Ragger15)
description:
Look around by moving your mouse. Hold left click to walk.

A prototype for a horror-based walking simulator. The full version focuses on the idea that as you roll poorer and poorer, the game gets slowly scarier as you walk home from work. Currently, most of the first zone is in place - the Office was designed to be the shortest zone to ease you into the mechanics, but for this demo, is all that exists.

Made in about 30 hours for Mini Jam 83: Dread
